about_the_game:
Adds two ATLUS-themed character portraits to your party:

  • Demi-fiend from Shin Megami Tensei III: Nocturne
  • Teddie from Persona 4 Golden

These portraits can only be accessed on Etrian Odyssey II HD.

content_descriptors.notes:
Fantasy Violence
Suggestive Themes
Mild Language
Alcohol Reference

detailed_description:
Adds two ATLUS-themed character portraits to your party:

  • Demi-fiend from Shin Megami Tensei III: Nocturne
  • Teddie from Persona 4 Golden

These portraits can only be accessed on Etrian Odyssey II HD.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-540 or AMD Phenom II X3 720
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: No anti-aliasing, 720p @ 60 FPS
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 4x AA, 1080p @ 60 FPS

short_description: Adds two ATLUS themed character portraits to your party: - Demi-fiend from Shin Megami Tensei III: Nocturne - Teddie from Persona 4 Golden These portraits can only be accessed on Etrian Odyssey II HD.
